message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $100. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable, but I want to give you some context. I've had some issues with this product in the past, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price because it's not at its best. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I'll take it.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on the previous product! I'm excited to offer you another opportunity. This product is one of our best sellers, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased this exact product, and I think you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to make it yours for $100?
I'm not sure about this one. I'd like to think about it for a moment.

I completely understand your hesitation! I want to assure you that this product is one of our top-of-the-line items. I've received excellent reviews from other customers, and I'm happy to provide you with some specific details about its features and benefits. Would you like me to walk you through its specifications and see if that helps you make a decision?
I'd love to hear more about the product's specifications. Go ahead and walk me through them.

I'm glad you're interested in learning more about the previous product! As promised, here are the specifications: [list of features and benefits]. Now, regarding the product I'm offering you today, I want to be upfront with you. I've had some issues with this particular item, and I'm being completely transparent with you about its quality. It's not our usual standard, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. Would you like to take a chance on it, or would you rather wait for a better option?
I'm not sure I want to take a chance on another potentially low-quality product. I'll wait for a better option.

I completely understand your concerns about the previous product. I want to assure you that this one is a different story. I've personally inspected this product, and I can confidently say it's one of our best. I'm willing to provide you with a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it out risk-free. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and purchase the product for $100?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to think about it for a moment.

I completely understand your caution, and I appreciate your diligence in considering your decision. Let me ask you, have you considered the potential benefits of owning a high-quality product like this one? Not only will it provide you with a sense of satisfaction and confidence, but it will also likely last longer and perform better than a lower-quality alternative. I'm willing to throw in a free maintenance service, worth $20, to sweeten the deal. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and purchase the product for $100?
I think you're right, a high-quality product would be a great investment. I'll take it.

I'm glad you're on board with investing in a high-quality product! Given that you've already purchased one from me, I want to offer you a special deal on this next one. I'll give you an exclusive discount of $20, bringing the price down to $80. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because I value our relationship. Would you like to take advantage of this deal and purchase the product?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm not sure I want to spend $80 on another product without knowing its quality. I'll pass for now.

I've already mentioned that I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price because it's not at its best. I'm willing to go even lower and offer it to you for $80. I'm not making a profit on this one, and I'm essentially giving it away. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still not willing to take a chance on a potentially low-quality product, even at a low price.
